testsuite.name: com.appname.tests.NewTest
testsuite.system-out: Chrome browser opened and url 'https://www.saucedemo.com/' is entered in the browser Entered user name as standard_user Entered password as secret_sauce Clicked on Login button PASS - Products page is displayed Product is selected and add to cart button is clicked PASS - Cart is displayed PASS - Selected item is displayed in the cart PASS - Total amount displayed matches with product cost Order placed successfully Logout button is clicked PASS - User is logged out and Swag labs login page is displayed
